sect1.title: Touch and Go
sect1.para: The main interface of the Freedom Toaster is a touchscreen liquid crystal display and an intuitive software interface. The software is designed to work as an off-the-shelf package that Just Works.

The main screen is one of several that cycle when the Freedom Toaster is not in use. Each screen provides information answering the common questions people have during their first encounter with a Freedom Toaster. From this screen people can see the Freedom Toasters main product categories.

Objective information about each of the products is made available. Touching the Previous or the Next button, people can browse the information provided at their leisure to make informed choices about what they would like to duplicate. Helpful information such as the number of CD/DVDs required ensures that people are prepared before making a selection.
When selections are made and burning commences, the Freedom Toaster provides feedback of the current progress for each of the CD/DVD devices loaded with writable media.
The entire Freedom Toaster interaction is designed as a Touch and Go experience that results in instant gratification the moment the CD/DVD writer ejects a duplicated media.
